item.title: The Perfect Atom Setup
item.description: I love my editor, Atom. I have tried most of them out there and still, I always come back to this one. It is not perfect but I find my peace in its imperfection. Here are few things I do to make my Atom awesome. Making it beautiful I am a connoisseur when it comes to beauty. If you want me hooked, be beautiful. I love beautiful code and here is what I do to make my editor look beautiful.
